name: Paradigm (itch) (Artindi)
description:
Beckett awakes, and equipped with the ability to make copies of himself, he must navigate a world that is hostile to anyone who goes alone... but he's not alone... not really....

This puzzle game is sure to make your brain hurt, and force you to think differently: In plurality rather then singularity. Will you follow the pattern? Or become the Paradigm?
